Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this Skill, you can control up to 3 Loewe TVs in your household.

Just say "Alexa, turn on T. V." and start controlling channel and volume by voice commands.

You must link your Loewe TV with Alexa first before you can use this skill. Follow the instructions in the Alexa screen on your TV (HOME > Apps > Alexa). Please note the required TV firmware version (V4.4.65 or higher)

In your smartphone's Alexa App, you can rename your "Loewe" according to your needs - e.g. name it "TV in the kitchen"

To switch on your Loewe TV with Alexa, the TV must be configured to be running in "quick start mode" (Settings > Control > Quick start mode). Additional to normal activation ("Alexa, switch on T. V.") you can also use channel commands to switch on your Loewe TV ("Alexa, switch to channel 3")
